abstract: Newspapers, already reeling from advertising revenue losses, are wary of Google’s latest move.
snippet: Newspapers, already reeling from advertising revenue losses, are wary of Google’s latest move.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Google began running small text ads on the pages of its Google News service this week, reviving a debate between the company and some struggling newspaper publishers, who have seen their businesses devastated by the shift of advertising to the Internet.

headline.main: Google Puts Small Ads on Pages of News Site
headline.print_headline: Google Puts Small Ads On Pages Of News Site

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Brian Stelter
